relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Officers always try to remember faces here on campus and always give everyone a sense of security by roming the streets day and night!
So many artistic clubs here at TWU!
TWU is great for any type of student! Especially for those who rather study that have loud music coming from your neighbors dorm.
Every year there is a great festival lights gathering right in the heart of the campus. Every tree and building lite up with beautiful Christmas lights!
Cheapest university in Texas! Plus great staff and housing!
The Rec Center is so much fun there's always exciting things happening there for every holiday!
Dorm life is great here! It's so safe and the RA's are always having great activities going on!
With the great professors here at TWU it's easy to pass your class with your dedication and their help of course.
Always make sure to complete EVERYTHING for your classes before doing anything that is'nt school work related.

TWU is an amazing campus that is easy to get around in. I guarentee that every staff member you meet will be able to help you with anything you need. It's one of a few great colleges that have a nursing program!
pageTitle: Texas Woman's University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {392602=If you go here, take this advice, get the University Meal Plan. If you get one of the ones with the meals and only some dining dollars you will regret it. You can only use those meals at the Underground and the majority of the time, that food sucks. When you get the University Meal Plan you get 1500 dollars that you can spend on anything at the university so its much more worth it., 67638=TWU is pretty cheap, even for out of state students. If you receive a scholarship of $1000, they give you in state tuition., 815225=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 774053=Overall, I am impressed with TWU. They have several programs that would fit for anybody. Currently, I am a senior graduating in May and my past fours years at TWU have been great. They have great staff in all departments, very friendly and always willing to help., 694006=There are a few activities to join like right now I am in boot camp it 6:30 a.m.-7:30a.m. they have sports for boys and girls and wild out doors activity., 35790=Tuition does go up every year, but what college doesn't? Right now for Fall 2011, tuition and fees for undergrad resident students taking about 12 hours (full time) is $2,714.32. That is not including housing. You can check it out here: http://www.twu.edu/bursar/6107.asp}

textAfterTable: Am learning a lot Pride, dignity, and liberation are words that come to mind when I think about Texas Woman’s University. This school has a personal goal to make sure that every man and woman that attends knows of the struggles woman went through in the past and the subliminal messages that keep them beautifully ignorant today. This school is serious about what it stands for and the education its students will receive. You will be surrounded by educational stimuli everyday. There is no way you can attend Texas Woman’s University without learning something that may change the way you see life forever. Login to rate or flag the reviews Molly from Paradise, TX 11/03/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 10 out of 11 people found this review useful. 3 of 202 Categories Comments Tips for prospective students If you're going for Nursing here, you need to be competitive.
